General.Name: Tianjin Binhai Energy & Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianjin Binhai Energy & Development Co.,Ltd produces and sells steam, electricity, and related products in China. The company's products are used in heating, non-electric air-conditioning refrigeration, equipment and process heating, disinfection, air purification, automotive, electronics, pharmaceutical, food, chemical, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Lighthouse Paint and Coatings Co., Ltd. Tianjin Binhai Energy & Development Co.,Ltd is based in Tianjin, China.
